snippet: Many communities across Texas are raising rates to pay for new water supplies and to encourage conservation, and many experts say it is about time.

byline.contributor: This article was reported and written with help from a media fellowship from the Bill Lane Center for the American West at Stanford University.

lead_paragraph: Many communities across Texas are raising rates to pay for new water supplies and to encourage conservation, and many experts say it is about time.

headline.seo: Navigating Water Rate Increases in Lingering Drought
headline.main: Navigating Water Rate Increases in Lingering Drought
headline.content_kicker: The Texas Tribune | The Last Drop
headline.print_headline: Navigating Water Rate Increases in Lingering Drought
